mapper.select: /*selectCartInfo*/ SELECT A.USR_ID AS userid, A.PRDT_NO AS productNum, A.PRDT_CNT AS cnt, B.PRDT_PRCE AS price, B.PRDT_NM AS productName, C.IMG_URL AS image, A.PRDT_CNT * B.PRDT_PRCE AS sum FROM TB_CART A INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT B ON A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO INNER JOIN TB_PRODUCT_IMAGE C ON B.PRDT_NO = C.PRDT_NO WHERE A.USR_ID = #{userid}

/*findByUseridAndProductNo*/ SELECT A.USR_ID AS userid, A.PRDT_NO AS productNum, A.PRDT_CNT AS cnt, B.PRDT_PRCE AS price, B.PRDT_NM AS productName, FROM TB_CART A, TB_PRODUCT B WHERE A.PRDT_NO = B.PRDT_NO AND A.USR_ID = #{map.userid} AND A.PRDT_NO = #{map.request.productNum}
mapper.insert: /*insertCartInfo*/ INSERT INTO TB_CART ( CRT_DT, UPD_DT, USR_ID, PRDT_NO, PRDT_CNT ) VALUES( SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{user.userid}, #{user.productNum}, #{user.cnt} )
